semantics.label: Image
semantics.description: Image to be used in the background.

semantics.label: Image
semantics.description: Image to be used in the foreground.

semantics.label: Visual settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control visual aspects.

fields.label: Image width
fields.description: Select the width of the space given that the image should cover. The image's height will be scaled accordingly and never exceed 100% width.

fields.label: Image alignment
fields.description: Select where the image should be positioned relative to the rest of the content.

fields.label: X-ray lens width
fields.description: Set the width of the X-ray lens as percentage of the image's width (e.g. 20%) or as a fixed value in pixels (e.g. 160px).

fields.label: X-ray lens height
fields.description: Set the height of the X-ray lens as percentage of the image's height (e.g. 25%) or as a fixed value in pixels (e.g. 90px).

fields.label: Darken foreground image on X-raying
fields.description: If set, the foreground image will darken to strengthen the focussing effect of X-raying.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Automatic X-raying
fields.description: If checked, the image gets X-rayed automatically while hovering it. Otherwise, the user needs to toggle X-Raying on and off.

fields.label: Hide X-ray indicator
fields.description: The X-ray indicator is used as the button for keyboard use. Hiding it will not prevent it from working, but users will have less navigational information.

fields.label: X-Ray
fields.description: Label for X-ray button (only visible to screenreader).

fields.label: X-Ray activated.
fields.description: Read when the X-Ray was activated.

fields.label: X-ray deactivated.
fields.description: Read when the X-ray was deactivated.

fields.label: Instructions
fields.description: Instructions on how to use the keyboard. Read when the X-ray is activated
fields.default: Use arrow keys to move X-ray lens.

fields.label: Moved lens to
fields.description: Read when the X-ray lens is moved. @positionHorizontal and @positionVertical are placeholders that will be replaced by the respective values.
fields.default: Moved lens to @positionHorizontal horizontally and to @positionVertical vertically.

fields.label: Unknown
fields.description: Fallback text for when the position of the lens cannot be determined.
